dream: Dreamt I was lost in NYC and I lost my cellphone and my reading glasses
interpretation:
Dreams about being lost often reflect feelings of uncertainty, confusion, or lack of direction in waking life. The dream may suggest that you are feeling lost or disconnected in some aspect of your life. Losing your cellphone and reading glasses in the dream implies a loss of communication and clarity. It may indicate a struggle to connect with others or a difficulty in understanding situations or finding solutions to problems.

The dream could also symbolize a fear of losing your sense of control or independence. Alternatively, it may represent a need to detach from technology and focus on the present moment or reconnect with yourself and your surroundings.

Overall, this dream suggests a need for self-reflection and finding a sense of direction and clarity. It may be beneficial to take some time to evaluate your current circumstances and identify areas where you may be feeling lost or disconnected.
title: Wandering the Concrete Jungle: A Lost Quest Without Tech or Sight
